cells.data:
- [x] Generate Pre-Signed Upload URL for S3
- [x] Link filename from /videos/upload to videos object.
- [x] Pre-Signed URLs for AWS Posts (Check Boto)
- [x] Implement naming convention / account linking for processing and completed jobs.
- [x] Setup Lambda Kickoff Jobs on S3 Upload
- [x] Implement ability to generate transcoding jobs automatically.
- [ ] Listen to AWS SNS for - 'RankedEncodingDone' and 'RankedEncodingFailed'
- [ ] Clean up old, non finished uploading files on S3 and video relations locally.
